Entries.TemplarsBlade_Description: It once belonged to an honourable knight.
Entries.WoodClub_Description: A solid piece of wood, crudely chiselled into a club shape.
Entries.PennysFryer_Description: Penny's favourite frying pan. There's some rubbery gunk stuck to the inside.
Entries.LeahsWhittler_Description: Leah's favourite tool for shaping driftwood.
